homepage: http://www.fivestarproduction.co.th/ผู้ใหญ่ลีกับนางมา/
original_title: ผู้ใหญ่ลีกับนางมา
overview: Malinee  receives a letter, which she’s inherited the ancestral land at Mae Jan mountain, from her deceased grandmother. She decides to move there. At this place, she meets village headman name, Lee.
title: Lee
